handNote.p: John Ruskin's early boyhood hand, circa 1833-34, examples of which can be found in MS I, pages ##-##.

div.head:
Table 2. List of Proposed Additional Sections and/or Works with Associated Illustrations
(See “Account” Apparatus: The Plan for Completion of the Work.)

row.cell: Begin with mountain. Tournament. Spectre. the Castle by moonlight. Prout Old House Prout on the Rhine. Braubach
Vignette tower, Prout. Fortress. Fortress my own. Pines.
Prout. The well. | The swiss cottages | × Un de les; William Tell Boys Own Book

Fall of the Rhine
(see also Table 1)
On the Rhine near Sargans with thunder — Also — Haymakers.
Ravine, On the Rhine near Tusis, Coire — Chateau of Trostberg
Brockedon, goats. Two from coloured plates
Covered bridge, Galleries coloured, Fountain. Ravine of Rofla.
Arch of snow with torrent Helvellyn
Brockedon. Passage of Cardinele coloured. Cascade. Vineyards of Chiavenna.
Sketch on lake of Chiavenna with boat. Como from Stanfield, Small part town
Rogers Italy. Como from Lord Byron, Lecco from Brockedon. Turner. beginning of Rogers memory
Villa plin [i.e., Villa pliniana] (see also Table 1)
Villa Poro. Cascata di Nesso. Prouts port of Como Como from Road to Erba. Brockedon
Rogers. view of the Alps near Turin ditto of the Appenines.
Mont Rosa, From Baths of Vallegio,
On Lake of Maggiore [Illegible] my own Brockedon with Carlo .??? Mary's Borromean isles. Monte Rosa from near Lou??. Brockedon.
Madonna [i.e., Madonna del monte] (see also Table 1)
Isola bella. Rogers. Domo dʼossola. from Brockedon (not from defile of Simplon) My own view with crags
Brockedon from defile with Domo d'Ossola. Entrance to Gondo Gallery. vignette. my own two.
Brockedon Defile of Dovedro looking back. Bernese Alps from Simplon. An adventure rogers
My recollection — 3. The glaciers of the Rhone.
Rogers. The valley of Rhône above, Martigny from Brockedon
great St B [i.e., The Grand St. Bernard] (see also Table 1)
lake of Gen [i.e., The Lake of Geneva] (see also Table 1)

Source of the Arveron
(see also Table 1)
